description:
Markdown-based note-taking app for developers

- Auto Save option for files, files can now be saved automatically, removing the need to press Ctrl+S and aligning their behavior with regular notes.
ðŸ›  Fixed
- Notes in the Trash are no longer displayed in the Note List.
- Menu list items can now be deleted even when the selection is reversed.

- Search bar icons (Ctrl+F in the code editor) no longer overlap or hide the search text.
